verses.verse: And the whole<WH3605> earth<WH776> was<WH1961> of one<WH259> language,<WH8193> and of one<WH259> speech.<WH1697>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> as they journeyed<WH5265> from the east,<WH4480> <WH6924> that they found<WH4672> a plain<WH1237> in the land<WH776> of Shinar;<WH8152> and they dwelt<WH3427> there.<WH8033>

And they said<WH559> one<WH376> to<WH413> another,<WH7453> Go to,<WH3051> let us make<WH3835> brick,<WH3843> and burn<WH8313> them throughly.<WH8316> And they had<WH1961> brick<WH3843> for stone,<WH68> and slime<WH2564> had<WH1961> they for mortar.<WH2563>

And they said,<WH559> Go to,<WH3051> let us build<WH1129> us a city<WH5892> and a tower,<WH4026> whose top<WH7218> may reach unto heaven;<WH8064> and let us make<WH6213> us a name,<WH8034> lest<WH6435> we be scattered abroad<WH6327> upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the whole<WH3605> earth.<WH776>
And the LORD<WH3068> came down<WH3381> to see<WH7200> <WH853> the city<WH5892> and the tower,<WH4026> which<WH834> the children<WH1121> of men<WH120> built.<WH1129>

And the LORD<WH3068> said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2005> the people<WH5971> is one,<WH259> and they have all<WH3605> one<WH259> language;<WH8193> and this<WH2088> they begin<WH2490> to do:<WH6213> and now<WH6258> nothing<WH3808> <WH3605> will be restrained<WH1219> from<WH4480> them, which<WH834> they have imagined<WH2161> to do.<WH6213>
Go to,<WH3051> let us go down,<WH3381> and there<WH8033> confound<WH1101> their language,<WH8193> that<WH834> they may not<WH3808> understand<WH8085> one<WH376> another's<WH7453> speech.<WH8193>

So the LORD<WH3068> scattered them abroad<WH6327> <WH853> from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of all<WH3605> the earth:<WH776> and they left off<WH2308> to build<WH1129> the city.<WH5892>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> is the name<WH8034> of it called<WH7121> Babel;<WH894> because<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> did there<WH8033> confound<WH1101> the language<WH8193> of all<WH3605> the earth:<WH776> and from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> did the LORD<WH3068> scatter them abroad<WH6327> upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>

These <WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Shem:<WH8035> Shem<WH8035> was a hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Arphaxad<WH775> two years<WH8141> after<WH310> the flood: <WH3999>
And Shem<WH8035> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begot<WH3205> <WH853> Arphaxad<WH775> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters.<WH1323>
And Arphaxad<WH775> lived<WH2425> five<WH2568> and thirty<WH7970> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Salah: <WH7974>

And Arphaxad<WH775> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begot<WH3205> <WH853> Salah<WH7974> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and three<WH7969> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters.<WH1323>
And Salah<WH7974> lived<WH2425> thirty<WH7970> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Eber: <WH5677>
And Salah<WH7974> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begot<WH3205> <WH853> Eber<WH5677> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and three<WH7969> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters.<WH1323>
And Eber<WH5677> lived<WH2421> four<WH702> and thirty<WH7970> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Peleg: <WH6389>
And Eber<WH5677> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begot<WH3205> <WH853> Peleg<WH6389> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters.<WH1323>
And Peleg<WH6389> lived<WH2421> thirty<WH7970> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Reu: <WH7466>
And Peleg<WH6389> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begot<WH3205> <WH853> Reu<WH7466> two hundred<WH3967> and nine<WH8672> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters.<WH1323>
And Reu<WH7466> lived<WH2421> two<WH8147> and thirty<WH7970> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Serug: <WH8286>
And Reu<WH7466> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begot<WH3205> <WH853> Serug<WH8286> two hundred<WH3967> and seven<WH7651> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters.<WH1323>
And Serug<WH8286> lived<WH2421> thirty<WH7970> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Nahor: <WH5152>
And Serug<WH8286> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begot<WH3205> <WH853> Nahor<WH5152> two hundred<WH3967> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters.<WH1323>
And Nahor<WH5152> lived<WH2421> nine<WH8672> and twenty<WH6242> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Terah: <WH8646>

And Nahor<WH5152> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begot<WH3205> <WH853> Terah<WH8646> a hundred<WH3967> and nineteen<WH8672> <WH6240> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters.<WH1323>
And Terah<WH8646> lived<WH2421> seventy<WH7657> years,<WH8141> and begot<WH3205> <WH853> Abram,<WH87> <WH853> Nahor,<WH5152> and Haran.<WH2039>

Now these<WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Terah:<WH8646> Terah<WH8646> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Abram,<WH87> <WH853> Nahor,<WH5152> and Haran;<WH2039> and Haran<WH2039> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Lot.<WH3876>
And Haran<WH2039> died<WH4191> before<WH5921> <WH6440> his father<WH1> Terah<WH8646> in the land<WH776> of his nativity,<WH4138> in Ur<WH218> of the Chaldees.<WH3778>

And Abram<WH87> and Nahor<WH5152> took<WH3947> them wives:<WH802> the name<WH8034> of Abram's<WH87> wife<WH802> was Sarai;<WH8297> and the name<WH8034> of Nahor's<WH5152> wife,<WH802> Milcah,<WH4435> the daughter<WH1323> of Haran,<WH2039> the father<WH1> of Milcah,<WH4435> and the father<WH1> of Iscah.<WH3252>
But Sarai<WH8297> was<WH1961> barren;<WH6135> she had no<WH369> child.<WH2056>

And Terah<WH8646> took<WH3947> <WH853> Abram<WH87> his son,<WH1121> and Lot<WH3876> the son<WH1121> of Haran<WH2039> his son's<WH1121> son,<WH1121> and Sarai<WH8297> his daughter-in-law,<WH3618> his son<WH1121> Abram's<WH87> wife;<WH802> and they went forth<WH3318> with<WH854> them from Ur<WH4480> <WH218> of the Chaldees,<WH3778> to go<WH1980> into the land<WH776> of Canaan;<WH3667> and they came<WH935> unto<WH5704> Haran,<WH2771> and dwelt<WH3427> there.<WH8033>
And the days<WH3117> of Terah<WH8646> were<WH1961> two hundred<WH3967> and five<WH2568> years:<WH8141> and Terah<WH8646> died<WH4191> in Haran.<WH2771>
